 2: /**
 3:  * Ce fichier est développé pour la gestion de la librairie Mélanie2
 4:  * Cette Librairie permet d'accèder aux données sans avoir à implémenter de couche SQL
 5:  * Des objets génériques vont permettre d'accèder et de mettre à jour les données

22: namespace LibMelanie\Sql;
23: 
24: /**
25:  * Liste des requêtes SQL vers les calendriers
26:  *
27:  * @author PNE Messagerie/Apitech
28:  * @package Librairie Mélanie2
29:  * @subpackage SQL
30:  *
31:  */
32: class SqlCalendarRequests {
33:     /**
34:      * @var SELECT
35:      * @param REPLACE {event_range}
36:      * @param PDO :calendar_id
37:      */
38:     const listAllEvents = "SELECT k1.*, k2.event_creator_id as organizer_uid, k2.event_attendees as organizer_attendees, k2.calendar_id as organizer_calendar FROM kronolith_events k1 LEFT JOIN kronolith_events k2    ON k1.event_uid = k2.event_uid AND char_length(k2.event_attendees) > 10 WHERE k1.calendar_id = :calendar_id{event_range};";
39: 
40:     /**
41:      * @var SELECT
42:      * @param REPLACE {event_range}
43:      * @param PDO :calendar_id
44:      */
45:     const listAllEventsFreebusy = "SELECT k1.* FROM kronolith_events k1 WHERE k1.calendar_id = :calendar_id{event_range};";
46: 
47:     /**
48:      * @var SELECT
49:      * @param PDO :calendar_id, :event_uid
50:      */
51:     const getEvent = "SELECT k1.*, k2.event_creator_id as organizer_uid, k2.event_attendees as organizer_attendees, k2.calendar_id as organizer_calendar FROM kronolith_events k1 LEFT JOIN kronolith_events k2 ON k1.event_uid = k2.event_uid AND char_length(k2.event_attendees) > 10 WHERE k1.calendar_id = :calendar_id AND k1.event_uid = :event_uid;";
52: 
53:     /**
54:      * @var SELECT
55:      * @param REPLACE {fields_list}
56:      * @param PDO :calendar_id, :event_uid
57:      */
58:     const getListEvents = "SELECT {fields_list}, k2.event_creator_id as organizer_uid, k2.event_attendees as organizer_attendees, k2.calendar_id as organizer_calendar FROM kronolith_events k1 LEFT JOIN kronolith_events k2 ON k1.event_uid = k2.event_uid AND char_length(k2.event_attendees) > 10 WHERE {where_clause};";
59: 
60:     /**
61:      * @var SELECT
62:      * @param REPLACE {where_clause}
63:      */
64:     const getCountEvents = "SELECT count(*) as events_count FROM kronolith_events k1 WHERE {where_clause};";
65: 
66:     /**
67:      * @var UPDATE
68:      * @param REPLACE {event_set}
69:      * @param PDO :calendar_id, :event_uid
70:      */
71:     const updateEvent = "UPDATE kronolith_events SET {event_set} WHERE calendar_id = :calendar_id AND event_uid = :event_uid;";
72: 
73:     /**
74:      * @var UPDATE
75:      * @param PDO :event_uid
76:      */
77:     const updateMeetingEtag = "UPDATE kronolith_events SET event_modified = event_modified + 1,  event_modified_json = event_modified_json + 1 WHERE event_uid = :event_uid;";
78: 
79:     /**
80:      * @var INSERT
81:      * @param REPLACE {data_fields}, {data_values}
82:      */
83:     const insertEvent = "INSERT INTO kronolith_events ({data_fields}) VALUES ({data_values});";
84: 
85:     /**
86:      * @var DELETE
87:      * @param PDO :calendar_id, :event_uid
88:      */
89:     const deleteEvent = "DELETE FROM kronolith_events WHERE calendar_id = :calendar_id AND event_uid = :event_uid;";
90: 
91:     /**
92:      * @var SELECT
93:      * @param :calendar_id
94:      */
95:     //const getCTag = "SELECT md5(CAST(sum(event_modified) AS varchar)) as ctag FROM kronolith_events WHERE calendar_id = :calendar_id;";
96:     const getCTag = "SELECT datatree_ctag as ctag FROM horde_datatree WHERE datatree_name = :calendar_id AND group_uid = 'horde.shares.kronolith'";
97: }
